parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname of IP address of the UniFi Controller

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port of the UniFi Controller

parameter.name: unifios
parameter.label: UniFi OS
parameter.description: If the UniFi Controller is running on UniFi OS.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: The username to access the UniFi Controller.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password to access the UniFi Controller.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds to poll the UniFi controller

parameter.name: sid
parameter.label: Site Id
parameter.description: The id, name or description of the site

parameter.name: wid
parameter.label: WLAN Id
parameter.description: The id or name of the wlan

parameter.name: cid
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: The MAC address, IP address, hostname or name of the client

parameter.name: site
parameter.label: Site
parameter.description: The site where the client should be found (optional)

parameter.name: considerHome
parameter.label: Consider Home Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds to consider the client as home

parameter.name: voucherCount
parameter.label: Number
parameter.description: Number of vouchers to create

parameter.name: voucherExpiration
parameter.label: Expiration Time
parameter.description: Minutes a voucher is valid after activation

parameter.name: voucherUsers
parameter.label: Users
parameter.description: Number of users for voucher, 0 if no limit

parameter.name: voucherUpLimit
parameter.label: Upload Speed Limit
parameter.description: Upload speed limit in kbps, no limit if not set

parameter.name: voucherDownLimit
parameter.label: Download Speed Limit
parameter.description: Download speed limit in kbps, no limit if not set

parameter.name: voucherDataQuota
parameter.label: Data Transfer Quota
parameter.description: Data transfer quota in MB per user, no limit if not set

parameter.name: portNumber
parameter.label: Port Number
parameter.description: The number of the port as reported by the UniFi switch

parameter.name: macAddress
parameter.label: Switch MAC Address
parameter.description: The MAC address of the switch this port is part of

parameter.name: mode
parameter.label: On Mode
parameter.description: The value to set when setting PoE on.
